message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,000, hoping we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $11,000 is a good start, but I'm looking to get it for a little less.  How about $10,500? I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer you the product for $10,800. This price reflects the value of the product while also considering your input. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
